inlineContent.text: A node that creates a window. The window can either be a native system window or embedded inside another

s will not close automatically when requested. You need to handle it manually using the [signal close_requested] signal (this applies both to pressing the close button and clicking outside of a popup).
This object emits the following signals:

is transient, i.e. it’s considered a child of another

. The transient window will be destroyed with its transient parent and will return focus to their parent when closed. The transient window is displayed on top of a non-exclusive full-screen parent window. Transient windows can’t enter full-screen mode.
